name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Eva to Yukai na Nakamatachi - Datsui Hokan Keikaku!
summary: Shinseiki Evangelion: Eva to Yukai na Nakamatachi - Datsui Hokan Keikaku! is an Adventure game, developed and published by Gainax, which was released in Japan in 1999.

alternative_names.name: Shinseiki Evangelion: Eva to Yukai na Nakamatachi - Datsui Hokan Keikaku!
